sentences.en: Blonde and slender, she was too striking to escape their attention.
sentences.cn: 金发细腰的她太引人注目了，他们很难不注意到她。

sentences.en: Erica was solemn, pulling at her blonde curls.
sentences.cn: 埃丽卡表情严肃，扯着自己卷曲的金发。
他有一头精心吹出发型的金发。

sentences.en: He was blonder than his brother.
sentences.cn: 他的头发比哥哥的还黄。

sentences.en: He wears his blonde hair unfashionably long.
sentences.cn: 他留着金色的长发，很不入时。

sentences.en: Her blonde hair was shiny and clean.
sentences.cn: 她的金发干净而有光泽。

sentences.en: Her name was Sheila, a long-legged blonde.
sentences.cn: 她叫希拉，是一位长腿的金发女郎。

sentences.en: Janet was a natural blonde with a good figure.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特天生一头金发，身材曼妙。

sentences.en: Melissa was a tall, buxom blonde.
sentences.cn: 梅利莎是个丰满的高个子金发美女。

sentences.en: Men swarmed around her, attracted by her beautiful blonde looks.
sentences.cn: 男人们被她金发碧眼的美貌迷得团团转。

sentences.en: She cropped her hair and dyed it blonde.
sentences.cn: 她把头发剪短并染成了金黄色。
她把头发染成了金黄色。

sentences.en: She is tall and blonde, with a permanent tan.
sentences.cn: 她高个儿，一头金发，皮肤黝黑。

sentences.en: She was tall, blonde, and attractive.
sentences.cn: 她个子高挑，一头金发，非常迷人。

sentences.en: the brassy blonde behind the bar
sentences.cn: 酒吧柜台里衣着艳俗的金发女郎
她的头发是金色还是深褐色？

words.tran_cn: 亚麻色的；白皙的；白肤金发碧眼的

trans.tran_en: Someone who is blonde has blonde hair
a woman with pale or yellow-coloured hair
